title: E-Learning Quality Evaluation Competency Enhancement Program for Korean Adult Language Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Online language learning experience, basic statistical analysis comprehension, and foundational knowledge of language curriculum evaluation
context.additional_context: A course for adult learners pursuing non-degree language programs in a BYOD environment, developing competencies to evaluate the quality of language learning content and platforms. Prioritizes designing customized assessment tools considering learners' reading comprehension and expressive abilities.

learning_goals: Korean adult language learners can explain the seven dimensions of e-learning quality they perceive (interaction, staff support, institutional quality assurance, institutional credibility, learner support, information & promotion, learning tasks) in the context of language education.
Learners perform exploratory factor analysis (EFA) using survey data to construct an e-learning quality evaluation model for language learning.
Learners validate the fit of the seven-dimension model through confirmatory factor analysis (CFA) and apply procedures to derive language learning content evaluation criteria.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
